page.title: 08CUDWORTH TOWNSHIP
page.content: {Cudworth}has two old people's homes, {Carlton House}and{Rose Tree Court. Cudworth has lots of{shops}and{four {schools;}there is a{big supermarket called "Leo's", 3 general stores and 3 banks. There is a{swimming bath}in the {park}where there are also{swings}and a {paddling pool.}There is a new{clinic with{7 doctors}and{2 dentists;}there are{3 chemists' shops.}We have 6 hair dressers and 2{post offices,}3 bakers and 3 farms. There is a{Bingo Hall near the Pond; it is called Walker's Bingo but used to be the{Rock Cinema. There are shops which sell spare parts for cars and lorries and two{garages which will repair your car. There are 3{Working Men's Clubs}and a{Library which lends you{books}to read. There are 2{pet shops}which sell fish, mice and things like that.
